about_the_game:
Bend Light & Time To Your Will!
Ascended is an interesting take on the puzzle genre & can be played in either first or third person with support for keyboard/mouse and controller. In the game levels are unlocked in a linear fashion as players complete the puzzles of rooms and direct beams of light to the next room but there is nothing stopping players from returning to previous levels if they choose. Players utilise a variety of abilities to aid them in accomplishing these puzzles, from the ability to shift time back & forth to the ability to manipulate the scaling, position and more of objects!



Here is an overview of what Ascended has to offer:
  • 🧪 Sixteen exciting puzzle levels connected through a laboratory hub! 🧪
  • ⚡ Ability to manipulate object sizes and positions! ⚡
  • 🕰 Ability to Move forward and backwards in time! 🕰
  • 🔦 Manipulate light through mirrors and reflectors from point to point! 🔦
  • 🕷 Moving platforms, laser spiders, turrets, force fields and more! 🕷

name: Ascended

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4210M (Or equivalent in performance)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 (Or equivalent in performance)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400 Quad-Core (Or equivalent in performance)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 (Or equivalent in performance)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Ascended, a game where you manipulate objects, time and light! Ascended is a sci-fi first/third person 3D puzzle platformer in which you must guide a light energy source through a series of sixteen exciting puzzle levels using the various abilities which you unlock along the way ⚡🧩!
